segments.text: I notice the boy is trying to get cookies from the jar, standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely unaware of the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she hasn't even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should pay more attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching his arm, trying to reach the cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, anticipating a treat from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of frustration, seeing the woman ignoring the potential dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger, and soon it might cause someone to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
